sentences.sContent: These institutions, which range from local courts to the United Nations, have vastly reduced the risk of violence both within and between nations.
sentences.sContent_eng: These institutions, which range from local courts to the United Nations, have vastly reduced the risk of violence both within and between nations.
sentences.sCn: 这些从地方法院到联合国的各种机构极大地降低了国家之间和国家内部的暴力威胁。

words.tran: 广阔的；巨大的；大量的；巨额的
